alert.note: Alert for Deer Lodge; Powell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued November 27 at 3:38PM MST until November 27 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Northeastern Deer Lodge County in west central Montana... South central Powell County in west central Montana... * Until 445 PM MST. * At 338 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located near Galen, or 10 miles southeast of Deer Lodge, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts greater than 50 mph could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous and life-threatening travel conditions are expected to develop rapidly in the warning area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 173 and 192. Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 0 and 12. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Garrison and Avon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
